arts.ttl: Rangers news: Russell Martin officially sacked following Falkirk draw
arts.sum: Rangers boss Russell Martin has officially been sacked following the club’s 1-1 draw against Falkirk on Sunday afternoon. Martin required a police escort following the draw against Falkirk on Sunday, after protesting Rangers fans blocked the club’s team bus outside the stadium, and his tenure at Ibrox has now ended ahead of the October international break.

arts.ttl: Rangers sack Martin following Falkirk draw
arts.sum: Rangers have sacked head coach Russell Martin after 123 days in charge.

arts.ttl: Russell Martin given police escort as furious Rangers fans block team bus after Falkirk draw
arts.sum: Rangers manager Russell Martin was targeted by his club's own angry supporters after his side drew 1-1 with Falkirk in the Scottish Premiership on Sunday afternoon

arts.ttl: Martin leaves Falkirk separately as fans delay Rangers bus
arts.sum: Watch Russell Martin leave Falkirk separately as Rangers fans hold up the team bus.

arts.ttl: Rangers fans unite to name every Russell Martin sin as Hotline pile on follows humiliation in Falkirk
arts.sum: Craig Swan manned the red hot phones with the under-fire Ibrox boss on the brink

arts.ttl: Russell Martin on Rangers brink LIVE as boss set for showdown talks with Ibrox chiefs
arts.sum: The boss is once again fighting for his job after their dreadful start to the season continued with a 1-1 draw at Falkirk

arts.ttl: Ibrox View: Rangers may have just sacked Russell Martin after wild footage from Falkirk
arts.sum: Russell Martin has lost the support of every single Rangers fan around the globe. It has been a somewhat impressive feat in only three months,... The post Ibrox View: Rangers may have just sacked Russell Martin after wild footage from Falkirk appeared first on Ibrox News.

arts.ttl: Russell Martin sneaks out side door as Rangers fans launch furious sitdown protest outside Falkirk Stadium
arts.sum: The boss had to exit from a side door as fans made their fury clear after the full-time whistle

arts.ttl: Rangers' team bus blocked in at Falkirk after draw
arts.sum: Rangers fans have blocked in the team bus after today's draw at Falkirk

arts.ttl: Martin escorted from Falkirk Stadium by police after Rangers draw
arts.sum: Russell Martin was escorted away from waiting Rangers fans by the police.
